thread.title: Can America survive three more years of Obama? | Fox News
thread.title_full: Can America survive three more years of Obama? | Fox News

title: Can America survive three more years of Obama? | Fox News
text:
Facebook 0 Twitter 0 livefyre Email Print FILE -- June 30, 2013: President Obama speaks at the University of Cape Town in Cape Town, South Africa. (AP Photo/Evan Vucci) 
Can the United States survive the remaining 3 1/2 years of the Obama presidency? That was the question I asked a well-known veteran of Washington politics and national-security issues. 
Though a Democrat, he is trusted and respected by both parties for his many years of advice and troubleshooting service to the nation. 
I asked the question because our long conversation reflected shared worries about the rise of Islamic fundamentalism and America’s retreat. We discussed the disasters of Syria, Benghazi and Obama’s strange support for the Muslim Brotherhood’s Mohammed Morsi in Egypt. We agreed the odds were growing that Iran would get a nuclear weapon and feared what it would mean for Israel and our Arab allies. 
[pullquote] 
We expressed shock at the lasting damage done to our intelligence agencies by Edward Snowden, the sloppy background check that enabled him to get security clearance in the first place and the Keystone Kops effort to capture him. We winced that our nation’s reputation was an international punch line as Russia and China mocked our president. More On This...
